languages.text: Аномалии Увечного сектора похитили из тела Абеляра здоровье и силу, состарив на десятилетия.
The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades.
languages.original_text: Аномалии Увечного сектора похитили из тела Абеляра здоровье и силу, состарив на десятилетия.

traits.locale_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades.

languages.text: ズタズタにされた星域の異常がアベラルドの健康と活力を奪い、彼は数十年分老いてしまった。
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades.

traits.locale_text: ズタズタにされた星域の異常がアベラルドの健康と活力を奪い、彼は数十年分老いてしまった。

languages.text: 崩落区的怪物窃取了阿贝拉德的生命力，让他转瞬之间年迈了几十岁。
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades.

traits.locale_text: 崩落区的怪物窃取了阿贝拉德的生命力，让他转瞬之间年迈了几十岁。

languages.text: Las anomalías del Sector Destrozado le han robado a Abelard la salud y el vigor y le han envejecido varias décadas.
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades.

traits.locale_text: Las anomalías del Sector Destrozado le han robado a Abelard la salud y el vigor y le han envejecido varias décadas.

languages.text: Die Anomalien im Zerfleischten Sektor haben Abelards Gesundheit und Lebenskraft geraubt und ihn um Jahrzehnte altern lassen.
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades.

traits.locale_text: Die Anomalien im Zerfleischten Sektor haben Abelards Gesundheit und Lebenskraft geraubt und ihn um Jahrzehnte altern lassen.

languages.text: Les anomalies du Secteur condamné ont sapé la vitalité et la vigueur d'Abélard, qui donne l'impression d'avoir pris vingt ans.
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades.

traits.locale_text: Les anomalies du Secteur condamné ont sapé la vitalité et la vigueur d'Abélard, qui donne l'impression d'avoir pris vingt ans.

languages.text: Ezilmiş Sektör'ün anomalileri, Abelard'ın sağlığını ve gücünü çalarak onu birkaç nesil yaşlandırıyor.
languages.original_text: The anomalies of the Mangled Sector have stolen Abelard's health and vigour and aged him several decades.

traits.locale_text: Ezilmiş Sektör'ün anomalileri, Abelard'ın sağlığını ve gücünü çalarak onu birkaç nesil yaşlandırıyor.
